name: Publishers.CollectByCount
desc: A publisher that buffers a maximum number of items.

items.name: init(upstream: Upstream, count: Int)
items.desc: Creates a publisher that buffers a maximum number of items.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: let upstream: Upstream
items.desc: The publisher that this publisher receives elements from.

items.name: let count: Int
items.desc: The maximum number of received elements to buffer before publishing.

items.name: static func == (Publishers.CollectByCount<Upstream>, Publishers.CollectByCount<Upstream>) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two publishers are equivalent.
